results.name: Dirichlet convolution of A003415 (Arithmetic derivative) with itself.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: A003415(n) = {my(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1]))}; \\ From A003415
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 13 2018
